commitResults.messageTitle: README: Update chatbot name to Lawrence
Lawrence.java: Implement skeletal chatbot version
Lawrence.java: Add echo feature to chatbot
Lawrence.java: Add ability to store & display tasks
Task.java: Add new class that allows task tracking
Tasks.java: Add collection to track multiple tasks
Lawrence.java: Modify class to use Tasks class for tracking
Add different task types to be tracked
commitResults.messageBody:
The original Task class is superseded by the
ToDo, Deadline and Event classes.

Lawrence.java is updated to handle the different
task types accordingly.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add basic automated text UI testing
commitResults.messageBody:
The single test case emulates user input and verifies
that the Lawrence class responds correctly when fed
a sequence of inputs.

Ideally, more test cases should be incorporated in
the future.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add error messages for user
commitResults.messageBody:
Most user misinputs will be recognised by the program
instead of crashing unexpectedly.

The test has also been updated to include some faulty
inputs.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to delete existing tasks
Add enums to handle different user commands
commitResults.messageBody:
The enum class is also flexible enough to handle
the capitalisation and partial capitalisation of commands.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to save and read tasks from hard disk
Add overloaded constructors to Task implementation
commitResults.messageBody:
This change is to facilitate initialising tasks that
may already be complete, which will be utilised when
reading from the hard disk.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add statement to close scanner after use
commitResults.messageBody: Also renamed io methods for clarity

commitResults.messageTitle: Separate logic for parsing file and user inputs
commitResults.messageBody:
This will keep parsing logic localised and can be
called accordingly depending on the source of the input

commitResults.messageTitle: Add factory class to handle parse method
commitResults.messageBody:
The factory will call the relevant class to parse
input strings depending on its source

commitResults.messageTitle: Add option to skip faulty lines when reading file
Fix bug from using wrong delimiter to split string
Integrate file saving with bot runtime
commitResults.messageBody: Also allows bot to initialise existing tasks on startup

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
Convert stored dates and time in LocalDateTime objects
Merge branch 'branch-Level-8'
Refactor existing classes to be less coupled
Refactor command classes
Create command factory to handle command creation
Merge branch 'oop-refactor'
